AutoCAD/LispTools/BreakUp.lsp.author: Kent Cooper
AutoCAD/LispTools/BreakUp.lsp.description: Breaks lines and polylines into segments with gaps for non-continuous appearance.

AutoCAD/LispTools/PolylineDimWidthHeight.author: Unknown (Autodesk forums)
AutoCAD/LispTools/PolylineDimWidthHeight.description: Places width and height dimensions for a closed polyline.

AutoCAD/LispTools/PLDiet.lsp.author: Kent Cooper
AutoCAD/LispTools/PLDiet.lsp.description: Removes excessive vertices from polylines to simplify geometry.

AutoCAD/LispTools/TLENGTH____US_v101.lsp.author: Patrice Braud
AutoCAD/LispTools/TLENGTH____US_v101.lsp.description: Calculates total length of selected lines and polylines.

AutoCAD/LispTools/ROTREF.lsp.author: Unknown
AutoCAD/LispTools/ROTREF.lsp.description: Rotates object to align with a reference line.

AutoCAD/LispTools/PathAverage.lsp.author: Unknown (Autodesk KB)
AutoCAD/LispTools/PathAverage.lsp.description: Creates a centerline between two selected polylines.

AutoCAD/Annotation/AD-Automatic Dimensio.author: Stefan M. (Kim Projects)
AutoCAD/Annotation/AD-Automatic Dimensio.description: Automatically creates dimensions on selected objects.

AutoCAD/Annotation/CreateLeadersWithCoun.author: P. DuMont
AutoCAD/Annotation/CreateLeadersWithCoun.description: Creates leaders with auto-incremented numeric labels.

AutoCAD/Annotation/CreateLegend.lsp.author: Lee Mac
AutoCAD/Annotation/CreateLegend.lsp.description: Counts and lists all block instances in drawing (nested support).
